# ifwtrends

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

ifwtrends is used to evaluate Google Trends data for economic 
forecasts.

## Installation

You can install the current development version of
ifwtrends from [GitHub](https://github.com/johannes97s/ifwtrends) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("johannes97s/ifwtrends")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
# library(ifwtrends)
## basic example code
```
